Title: Requires pharmacies to provide prescription drug readers
Summary: Requires pharmacies to provide prescription drug readers or other means of access to individuals who disclose they have difficulty seeing or reading standard print labels on prescription drug containers; defines "prescription drug reader" to mean a device which is capable of audibly conveying information contained on the label of a prescription drug; makes exceptions.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to prescription drug label accessibility
